org.jhove2.config.spring
Class SpringRuleSetFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.config.spring.SpringRuleSetFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
RuleSetFactory
@Persistent
public class SpringRuleSetFactory
extends Object
implements RuleSetFactory

Spring-based implementation of RuleSetFactory for creating a collection of RuleSet objects.

Author:
rnanders

Method Detail

getRuleSetMap

public static ConcurrentMap<String,List<RuleSet>> getRuleSetMap()
                                                         throws JHOVE2Exception
Returns the ruleSetMap. First time it is called it creates the Map by searching the Spring config files for all objects of type RuleSet, then indexing them by RuleSet.objectFilter

Returns:
{@link #ruleSetMap
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception

getRuleSetList

public List<RuleSet> getRuleSetList(String className)
                             throws JHOVE2Exception
Returns a list of RuleSet for assessment of a object having the type specified.

Specified by:
getRuleSetList in interface RuleSetFactory
Parameters:
className - The className (type) of the object for which a corresponding RuleSet instance should be returned
Returns:
List<RuleSet> if one is found for the object type, otherwise null
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception
